mapper.insert: insert into review (review_id, review_title, buy_id, review_ct, review_img, review_date) values(review_id_seq.nextval, #{reviewTitle}, #{buyId}, #{reviewCt}, #{reviewImg}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from review natural join buy where pdt_id = #{pdtId}

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM review left outer join buy using(buy_id) where user_id=#{userId} and pdt_id=#{pdtId} ORDER BY 1 DESC) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${page} * 10) b WHERE b.rn > (${page} - 1) * 10
